languages.text: {n}Вы пытаетесь вытолкнуть слова из горла, но они застревают удушающим комом, перебивая дыхание. Завидев ваши мучения, Хейнрикс быстро сменяет тему:{/n} "Очевидно, Вольный Торговец поражен{mf||а} осознанием того, что все это время Теодора использовала {mf|его|ее}, чтобы помешать мне..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Вы пытаетесь вытолкнуть слова из горла, но они застревают удушающим комом, перебивая дыхание. Завидев ваши мучения, Хейнрикс быстро сменяет тему:{/n} "Очевидно, Вольный Торговец поражен{mf||а} осознанием того, что все это время Теодора использовала {mf|его|ее}, чтобы помешать мне..."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}You try to push the words out of your throat but they become stuck in a suffocating lump, choking you. Heinrix notices your struggle and quickly changes the subject:{/n} "The Rogue Trader is obviously stunned by the realisation Theodora has been using {mf|him|her} this entire time to impede me..."
languages.original_text: {n}Вы пытаетесь вытолкнуть слова из горла, но они застревают удушающим комом, перебивая дыхание. languages.text: {n}Vous tentez de prononcer quelques mots, mais ils restent coincés dans votre gorge telle une boule suffocante. Heinrix remarque votre effort et change rapidement de sujet :{/n} « {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} est manifestement {mf|sidéré|sidérée} d'apprendre que Théodora s'est servie {mf|de lui|d'elle} pendant tout ce temps pour m'empêcher... »
languages.original_text: {n}You try to push the words out of your throat but they become stuck in a suffocating lump, choking you. Heinrix notices your struggle and quickly changes the subject:{/n} "The Rogue Trader is obviously stunned by the realisation Theodora has been using {mf|him|her} this entire time to impede me..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous tentez de prononcer quelques mots, mais ils restent coincés dans votre gorge telle une boule suffocante. Heinrix remarque votre effort et change rapidement de sujet :{/n} « {Mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} est manifestement {mf|sidéré|sidérée} d'apprendre que Théodora s'est servie {mf|de lui|d'elle} pendant tout ce temps pour m'empêcher... »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}你试图把这些话从喉咙里挤出来，但你的喉咙就像肿起来一样，什么声音都发不出来。海因里希注意到你痛苦的样子，立刻改变了话题。{/n}“很显然，行商浪人惊呆了。因为{mf|他|她}刚刚意识到，西奥多拉一直在利用{mf|他|她}阻止我……”
languages.original_text: {n}You try to push the words out of your throat but they become stuck in a suffocating lump, choking you. Heinrix notices your struggle and quickly changes the subject:{/n} "The Rogue Trader is obviously stunned by the realisation Theodora has been using {mf|him|her} this entire time to impede me..."

traits.locale_text: {n}你试图把这些话从喉咙里挤出来，但你的喉咙就像肿起来一样，你什么声音都发不出来。海因里希注意到你痛苦的样子，立刻改变了话题。{/n}“很显然，行商浪人惊呆了。因为{mf|他|她}刚刚意识到，西奥多拉一直在利用{mf|他|她}阻止我……”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}あなたが喉から押し出そうとする言葉は、しこりのように張り付いていて息を詰まらせる。ハインリックスはあなたの苦闘の表情に気づき、すぐに話題を変えた。{/n}「自由開拓者は、シオドーラが私を妨害するためにずっと自分を利用していたことに気づき、明らかに愕然としているようだが…」
languages.original_text: {n}You try to push the words out of your throat but they become stuck in a suffocating lump, choking you. Heinrix notices your struggle and quickly changes the subject:{/n} "The Rogue Trader is obviously stunned by the realisation Theodora has been using {mf|him|her} this entire time to impede me..."

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたが喉から押し出そうとする言葉は、しこりのように張り付いていて息を詰まらせる。ハインリックスはあなたの苦闘の表情に気づき、すぐに話題を変えた。{/n}「自由開拓者は、シオドーラが私を妨害するためにずっと自分を利用していたことに気づき、明らかに愕然としているようだが…」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Du versuchst, die Worte aus deiner Kehle zu drängen, doch sie bleiben dort stecken wie ein erstickender Klumpen, der dir den Atem abschnürt. Heinrix bemerkt, wie du kämpfst, und wechselt schnell das Thema:{/n} "{mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} ist offenbar ganz erstaunt darüber, dass Theodora {mf|ihn|sie} die ganze Zeit über nur benutzt hat, um mich zu behindern ..."
languages.original_text: {n}You try to push the words out of your throat but they become stuck in a suffocating lump, choking you. Heinrix notices your struggle and quickly changes the subject:{/n} "The Rogue Trader is obviously stunned by the realisation Theodora has been using {mf|him|her} this entire time to impede me..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Du kämpfst mit den Worten in deiner Kehle, aber sie bleiben dort stecken wie ein erstickender Klumpen, der dir den Atem abschnürt. Heinrix bemerkt, wie du kämpfst, und wechselt schnell das Thema:{/n} "{mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} ist offenbar ganz erstaunt darüber, dass Theodora {mf|ihn|sie} die ganze Zeit über nur benutzt hat, um mich zu behindern ..."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Intentas forzar las palabras para que salgan de tu garganta, pero se atascan en un nudo que se te atraganta. Heinrix se percata de cómo te debates y cambia de tema rápidamente:{/n} «Resulta obvio que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente está {mf|atónito|atónita} por la revelación de que Theodora le ha estado utilizando todo este tiempo para obstaculizar mi labor...».
languages.original_text: {n}You try to push the words out of your throat but they become stuck in a suffocating lump, choking you. Heinrix notices your struggle and quickly changes the subject:{/n} "The Rogue Trader is obviously stunned by the realisation Theodora has been using {mf|him|her} this entire time to impede me..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Intentas forzar las palabras para que salgan de tu garganta, pero se atascan en un nudo que te corta la respiración. Heinrix se percata de cómo te debates y cambia de tema rápidamente:{/n} «Resulta obvio que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente está {mf|atónito|atónita} por la revelación de que Theodora le ha estado utilizando todo este tiempo para obstaculizar mi labor...».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Kendini zorlayarak bir şeyler söylemeye çalışıyorsun ancak kelimeler boğazında yumru olup seni boğuyor. Yaşadığın zorluğu fark eden Heinrix, hızla konuyu değiştiriyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir belli ki tüm bunca zamandır Theodora'nın beni engellemek için kendisini kullandığı gerçeğinin farkına varmanın şokunu yaşıyor."
languages.original_text: {n}You try to push the words out of your throat but they become stuck in a suffocating lump, choking you. Heinrix notices your struggle and quickly changes the subject:{/n} "The Rogue Trader is obviously stunned by the realisation Theodora has been using {mf|him|her} this entire time to impede me..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kendini zorlayarak bir şeyler söylemeye çalışıyorsun ancak kelimeler boğazında bir yumru oluşturuyor ve seni boğuyor. Heinrix yaşadığın zorluğu fark ediyor ve hızla konuyu değiştiriyor:{/n} "Hür Tacir belli ki tüm bu zaman boyunca Theodora'nın beni engellemek için kendisini kullandığı gerçeğinin farkına varmanın şokunu yaşıyor."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
